subject: Leadership

description: A micro-lesson that makes Delegation and Empowerment usable.

buildup.text: Delegation means assigning authority and responsibility, not just tasks. It requires trust and clear expectations.

discovery.text: Effective delegation follows a spectrum from 'do as I say' to 'own it fully.' Match the level to readiness.

twist.text: The biggest barrier to delegation isn't the team's capabilityâ€”it's the leader's fear of losing control.

climax.text: Empowered teams make faster decisions, develop more skills, and free leaders to focus on strategy over tasks.

punchline.text: Leaders who delegate multiply. Those who hoard divide.

quiz.question: What is the biggest barrier to delegation?
